data.text: Nnome nka nhwiren abotire a ɛyɛ Efraim asabofoɔ ahohoahoadeɛ no,
Hwɛ, Awurade wɔ obi a ɔwɔ tumi ne ahoɔden.
Saa nhwiren abotire no a ɛyɛ Efraim asabofoɔ ahohoahoadeɛ no,
Saa nhwiren a nʼahoɔfɛ ɛrepa wɔ animuonyam mu
Saa ɛda no Asafo Awurade
Ɔbɛyɛ atɛntenenee honhom
Nanso seesei deɛ, asabofoɔ na wɔdi Israel so,
Ɛfeɛ agugu apono nyinaa so,
Wɔka sɛ, “Deɛn na Awurade dwene fa yɛn ho?
Ɔkasa bebree:
Ɛno enti, ɛyɛ ananafoɔ ano ne kasa foforɔ
Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ,
Enti afei Awurade bɛti asɛm a ɔde maa wɔn no mu bio:
Ɛno enti, montie Awurade asɛm, mo fɛdifoɔ
Mohoahoa mo ho sɛ, “Yɛ ne owuo ayɛ apam,
Enti, deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ nie,
Mede atɛntenenee bɛyɛ susuhoma
Mɛtwa apam a wo ne owuo ayɛ no mu;
Mperɛ dodoɔ biara a ɛbɛba no, ɛbɛsoa mo akɔ;
Mpa no yɛ tia dodo ma sɛ wɔtene wɔn mu wɔ so.
Awurade bɛsɔre sɛdeɛ ɔsɔree wɔ Perasim bepɔ so no.
Afei gyae wo fɛdie no,
Montie na monte me nne;
Sɛ okuafoɔ funtum asase sɛ ɔrebɛdua so a, ɔyɛ no daa anaa?
Sɛ ɔsiesie asase no ani a,
Ne Onyankopɔn ma no akwankyerɛ
Wɔmfa asaeɛ mpɔ ɛme ho,
Wɔyam aburoo de to burodo
Yeinom nyinaa firi Asafo Awurade,
